Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs before any rejection by a PRE_APPROVER in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that are part of process variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in comparison to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' events that directly precede 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' without intermediate rejections
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of total activity executions represented by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases with amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that occur in the most frequent variant (i.e., the top variant by frequency)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is performed but the process later includes 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of process instances where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs more than once due to prior rejections
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that successfully reach 'Payment Handled' within three activity steps
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' compared to the total number of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' events
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is immediately followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', avoiding PRE_APPROVER involvement
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all approval activities (including 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is followed by a rejection (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' or 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of process variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that avoid any rejection step
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' appears in variants that include at least one rejection by any role
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' per year (2017 vs 2018) to assess temporal trends related to rejections
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that are not followed by any further approval steps (indicating possible bypass of PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases
